definition: to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation

sentences.english: And why do we fall for it, year after year?
sentences.chinese: 而我們又爲什麼年復一年爲之傾倒？

sentences.english: The Righteous One takes note of the house of the wicked and brings the wicked to ruin.
sentences.chinese: 義人思想惡人的家，知道惡人傾倒，必至滅亡。

sentences.english: I think back over the compendium of knowledge that exists there, and it still takes my breath away.
sentences.chinese: 現在回想起存於其中的知識概要，仍舊令我爲之傾倒。

sentences.english: A lorry was going to dump sugarcane into the hopper.
sentences.chinese: 拼裝車正要傾倒一車甘蔗至轉裝臺的漏斗。

sentences.english: A lorry was dumping sugarcane into the hopper.
sentences.chinese: 拼裝車正傾倒一車甘蔗至轉裝臺的漏斗。

sentences.english: And he answered and said, Babylon is fallen, is fallen; and all the graven images of her gods he hath broken unto the ground.
sentences.chinese: 傾倒了，他一切雕刻的神像，都打碎於地。

sentences.english: Children gathered around a truck as it dumped water in a trash dump near Cité Soleil.
sentences.chinese: 日光城附近，兒童聚集在一輛傾倒污水的卡車旁。

sentences.english: The truck dumped two loads of gravel on the driveway.
sentences.chinese: 卡車把兩卡車礫石傾倒在車道口。

sentences.english: Half of those pass straight through where the rubbish will be.
sentences.chinese: 其中一半會直接通向將來垃圾被傾倒的地方。

sentences.english: The sudden canting of the ship had made the deck no place for running on;
sentences.chinese: 船身突然傾倒使甲板上沒有地方可以躲閃。

sentences.english: Get CLOSE UP of steaming water being poured.
sentences.chinese: 給傾倒中冒着熱氣的水特寫。

sentences.english: The only people who have sought physically to stop this dumping are Somali pirates.
sentences.chinese: 唯一挺身而出阻止這種傾倒行爲的人是索馬里海盜。

sentences.english: Her fans were stormed by her performance and her charm.
sentences.chinese: 她的表演和魅力使她的狂熱愛好者傾倒。

sentences.english: Slope in the upper anchorage or Poding beam fixed to prevent dumping.
sentences.chinese: ⑶坡體中上部錨固或坡頂連梁固定防止傾倒。

sentences.english: Western leftists were enamored with its Marxist anti-Americanism.
sentences.chinese: 西方的左派被書中馬克思主義的反美論調所傾倒。

sentences.english: She was beautiful with that unmistakable beauty that only artists delight in .
sentences.chinese: 她的美是一望而知的，只有藝術家纔會傾倒的。

definition: to exclaim in admiration/a gasp of surprise
to recount/to narrate/to give an account of
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
to cry out in alarm or surprise
to engulf/to bury/to overlook/to stifle/to neglect/to fall into oblivion
to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip
